Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Web UI compressor 0.4.4 API

Packages
com.github.wuic This package is the most general package of the WUIC library.
com.github.wuic.engine This package contains the definition of an Engine.
com.github.wuic.engine.core Package where engines and their builers implementations are defined for core module.
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.ehcache This package contains the engines which are based on the EhCache framework.
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.embedded This package contains the engines which don't delegate its work to any library like YUI Compressor.
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.yuicompressor This package contains the engines which are based on the YUI Compressor library.
com.github.wuic.engine.setter This package defines basic stuff to implement the EngineBuilder.
com.github.wuic.exception This package contains all common exceptions which could be thrown by WUIC.
com.github.wuic.exception.wrapper This packages defines exceptions which wrap or represent a particular and common exception.
com.github.wuic.exception.xml This package contains all exceptions related to wuic.xml path.
com.github.wuic.jee The base package for the JEE module.
com.github.wuic.jee.path This package provides webapp support for Path manipulations.
com.github.wuic.nut This package defines what is a nut in WUIC and how to manage it.
com.github.wuic.nut.core Package where nuts and their builers implementations are defined for core module.
com.github.wuic.nut.ftp This package defines required implementation for Nut stored in a FTP server.
com.github.wuic.nut.gstorage This package defines required implementation for nut stored in a S3 AWS.
com.github.wuic.nut.jee This package provides webapp support for Nut manipulations.
com.github.wuic.nut.s3 This package defines required implementation for nut stored in a S3 AWS.
com.github.wuic.nut.setter This package defines basic stuff to implement the NutDaoBuilder.
com.github.wuic.nut.ssh Package where nuts and their builers implementations are defined for FTP module.
com.github.wuic.path This package defines the contracts and abstractions of those contracts of a little API designed by WUIC to resolve path navigation.
com.github.wuic.path.core This package defines core implementation of the path API to resolve a hierarchical path with each element corresponding to either a path, a directory, a ZIP archive or an entry of a ZIP archive.
com.github.wuic.plugins.maven This package provides the maven plugin support for static generation at build time.
com.github.wuic.sample.polling.servlet Contains the classes demonstrating the polling capabilities.
com.github.wuic.sample.thymeleaf Contains the classes demonstrating the thymeleaf support.
com.github.wuic.servlet This package defines the Servlet support provided by WUIC.
com.github.wuic.tag This package defines the tags provided by WUIC.
com.github.wuic.thymeleaf This package contains the thymeleaf features.
com.github.wuic.util Utility package where helper methods are defined.
com.github.wuic.xml This package provides the classes which read the 'wuic.xml' path.
